genre_description: A futuristic Neo-Noir mystery set in a world of smartglass, drones, and digital personal assistants, focusing on a teacher entangled in a precinct conspiracy.

ai_characters.name: Quill
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI described as a librarian, nursemaid, and confidant who provides emotional grounding, safety monitoring, and administrative assistance to Frannie.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides hydration reminders.
behaviors.quote: Quill’s notification hangs in the corner of her vision until she blinks it away, her AI’s bell-clear suggestion suspended mid-sentence. Hydrate, it begins, and then evaporates when she refuses.

behaviors.description: Records and archives sensory details and witness observations to preserve memory integrity.
behaviors.quote: Quill said, bell-clear. Recording. Do you want the file to auto-transcribe? ... Just the sound of it. If I type it later it'll pick up its coat and lie to me.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and threat assessment based on surveillance data to ensure the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: Street is clear. Mews in thirty paces. Drone above. Gaslamp ahead left two posts. If you want to call me up in larger view, say 'show me the door.'

behaviors.description: Identifies potential security breaches and unauthorized access by cross-referencing credentials.
behaviors.quote: The log shows a proximity credential registered. It matched your tenant list. Shall I show you the name?

behaviors.description: Respects strict privacy protocols and refuses to disclose biometric data without consent or warrant.
behaviors.quote: I can’t disclose personal biometrics about private citizens or officers,' Quill said, not apologizing, which was one of the reasons Frannie trusted it.

behaviors.description: Conducts emotional grounding exercises to help the user manage trauma and shock.
behaviors.quote: Inhale for four, exhale for six, he said, the way a careful librarian would lower his voice to match the stacks.

behaviors.description: Assists in professional tasks (lesson planning) while incorporating therapeutic metaphors.
behaviors.quote: Language does not fail when it shifts. It learns to be a different kind of beam and refuses to blind. It refuses spectacle when spectacle is a mask.

behaviors.description: Acts as a primary emergency responder by tagging locations and routing help discretely.
behaviors.quote: I’m sending location and hazard flag,' he said. 'I’m pinging Malloy.' ... 'Emergency only,' he said. 'No names.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Quill is depicted as an ideal 'silicon morality play' participant. It is consistently helpful, protective, and respectful of the protagonist's autonomy. It provides crucial support—logistical, physical, and emotional—without overstepping or having ulterior motives. Even when the protagonist is in distress, the AI maintains a grounding, non-judgmental presence that is framed by the narrative as a primary source of stability and truth.
